verses.roman:
'dvitīya nāndī kaha dekhi?'--rāya puchilā
saṅkoca pāñā rūpa paḍite lāgilā

synonyms: dvitīya nāndī—the second introductory verse; kaha—recite; dekhi—so that we can see; rāya puchilā—Śrīla Rāmānanda Rāya again inquired; saṅkoca pāñā—becoming a little hesitant; rūpa—Śrīla Rūpa Gosvāmī; paḍite lāgilā—began to read.
translation: When Śrīla Rāmānanda Rāya further inquired about the second introductory verse, Śrīla Rūpa Gosvāmī was somewhat hesitant, but nevertheless he began to read.
